name: 雷雪莲
introduction: Leann is an actress, a producer, a director, a classically trained opera singer, and a CA certified music and Mandarin teacher. She graduated from XingHai Music University China where she has received classical music training including singing opera, playing piano and accordion etc. Leann lived in China, Austria, and the American South teaching vocal performance, music and Mandarin before moving to Los Angeles. She speaks Mandarin, English, Cantonese, and also conversational German.
